definitions.definition: Anxious or particular about petty details; hard to please.
Having a tendency to fuss , cry , or be bad-tempered / ill-tempered (especially of babies ).
Having much unnecessary detail or decoration.

main_definition: Anxious or particular about petty details; hard to please.
secondary_definitions: Having a tendency to fuss , cry , or be bad-tempered / ill-tempered (especially of babies ).
Having much unnecessary detail or decoration.
